A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, really bad. Hard to believe a blockbuster franchise would have such bad writing. No real reasons for any of the characters actions\, a slow speed chase through space. Luke is a scared puppy who wont train Rey\, Leia had a chance to go out a hero\, but is a coward and lets another go down with the ship. In a franchise with such great final battles and memorable lines\, “Luke\, Im your Father”\, “I have the High Ground/ you were the chosen one\, Anakin” \, “ if you strike me down Darth\, I will become far more powerful” in the end Ren taunts Luke about the jedis utter ddeddded\, we get “everything you just said is wrong” aimed at getting laughs from 8 year olds... The whole movie has the joke/ gag reel running full speed to appease the Teen/ Disney crowd\, and that is what this movie is\, a sad joke.
